well they must be out of their minds..besides it kills me when people are s=
o quick to say "demon" it's actually very very rare..not to say it don't ha=
ppen but it's rare

--- On Fri, 2/11/11, Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@yahoo=
.com> wrote:


From: Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>
Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: My un-understanding
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, Febr=
uary 11, 2011, 1:50 AM


=C2=A0 



oh dear god, there are actually people =
who intentionally seek out demons???? wait, aren't they called satanists? I=
 think there should be like a universal rule in paranormal investigation ag=
ainst intentionally trying to seek that out. Who in their right mind, willi=
ng to believe that the other side exists, would intentionally seek out its =
darkest most negative aspects???? 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "purple=
spacefriend" <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I seem to run into moslty the=
 ones that are after domons and the darkest crap they can dig up. 
> 
> F-S=

> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ursula Kalin <kalinu@> wrote:
> >
> >=
 Most people I know are=C3=82=C2=A0in a group are not in it to be scared..L=
ike you Adriana=C3=82=C2=A0they looking for proof of some kind..I'm a found=
er of a group..but I don't go ghost hunting..lol I don't have to,=C3=82=C2=
=A0 I understand that some people are still looking for personal reasons or=
 just being curious...I don't have my group paying for places we go..unless=
 its like a very hot spot such as Mansfield which we are going in April but=
 most places we go we are invited free of charge..we were just at a "haunte=
d hotel" for free.
> > 
> > --- On Thu, 2/10/11, Adriana Jones <adrianamjon=
es@> wrote:
> > 
> > 
> > From: Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@>
> > Subject:=
 [EVP-ITC] Re: My un-understanding

: Thursday, February 10, 2011, 4:24 PM

> > 
> >=
 
> > 
> > I never wanted to be scared. That was never my intention when I =
joined a ghosthunting group. I just wanted to make contact with something o=
ther than physical human. And I definitely got to, even felt what was appar=
ently a ghost (the tingling feeling in the air). And I was happy, and it fe=
lt peaceful. I think I'd be equally happy to meet a space alien coming out =
of a spaceship. As long as they didn't laser beam me when I go to hug them.=
 :)
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adriana Jones" <adrianamjones=
@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Agreed. I was introduced to the ghost box at a parano=
rmal group meeting, but ever since then the vast majority of my sessions ha=
ve been at home. I went to a few cemeteries at midnight at first, but that =
quickly wore off when I realized that I get equal, and even better, communi=
cation, just sitting at the dining room table.
> > > 
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com, "purplespacefriend" <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> > > >
> > =
> > My approach to EVP and ITC is for spirit communcation not associated wi=
th supposed hauntings. That's why I find it frustrating that most insist on=
 running aorund in the dark to get evidence and EVP when they could stay ho=
me and get much more. Spirits and entities travel, even the ones that are s=
upposedly stuck will come to you if asked. I don't like the Halloween, and =
fear crap. I think most just want to be frightened, so they pay gigabucks t=
o go the haunted hot spots hoping beyond hope to get scared out their wits =
by imaginary demons.
> > > > 
> > > > F-S
> > > >
> > >
> >
>
